subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: One thing that helped tip the scales for Torres was when he was overlooked by Mexico’s coach, Sven-Goran Eriksson, who omitted him from the roster for a friendly in Chile in September.
snippet: One thing that helped tip the scales for Torres was when he was overlooked by Mexico’s coach, Sven-Goran Eriksson, who omitted him from the roster for a friendly in Chile in September.
